00081 // SAFE_DELETE Macro set.
00082 #define SAFE_DELETE(ptr) if ((ptr) != NULL) { delete (ptr); (ptr) = NULL; } 
00083 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(ptr) if (ptr != NULL) { delete [] ptr; ptr = NULL; } 
00084 #define SAFE_FREE(ptr) if (ptr != NULL) { free(ptr); ptr = NULL; } 
00085 #define SAFE_RELEASE(ptr) if ((ptr) != NULL) { (ptr)->Release(); (ptr) = NULL; } 
00086 #define CLEAR_POINTER_VECTOR(a) { size_t l = (a).size(); for (size_t i = 0; i < l; ++i) SAFE_DELETE((a)[i]); (a).clear(); } 
00087 #define CLEAR_ARRAY_VECTOR(a) { size_t l = (a).size(); for (size_t i = 0; i < l; ++i) SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY((a)[i]); (a).clear(); } 
00088 #define CLEAR_POINTER_STD_PAIR_CONT(cont, a){ for (cont::iterator it = (a).begin(); it != (a).end(); ++it) SAFE_DELETE((*it).second); (a).clear(); } 
00089 #define CLEAR_POINTER_STD_CONT(cont, a){ for (cont::iterator it = (a).begin(); it != (a).end(); ++it) SAFE_DELETE((*it)); (a).clear(); }
